segments.text: I've got an idea . Let's make this game even more interesting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How ? Do you want to play strip-trivia or something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you want to ! Seriously , though , let's make a bet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't we just make it a friendly game ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be such a chicken ! Whoever loses has to treat everyone to a movie .
segments.speaker: S1
